title: Total Drama Revenge of the Island
subtitle: The season where loyalty was tested—and broken

placements.name: Emma
placements.notes: 4 votes to win (3–3–1 tie + tiebreaker) • 4 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 0 votes against

placements.name: Scott
placements.notes: 3 votes to win • 6 challenge wins • 3 immunity wins • 1 votes against

placements.name: Cameron
placements.notes: 1 vote to win; cast tiebreaker • 3 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • Found idol Ep4; played Ep12 • 4 votes against

placements.name: Zoey
placements.notes: 3–1 vote • 4 challenge wins • 2 immunity wins • 3 votes against

placements.name: Anne Maria
placements.notes: 4–1* vote (idol cancelled 1) • 1 challenge wins • 15 votes against

placements.name: Brick
placements.notes: 5–2–2 vote • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 5 votes against

placements.name: Lightning
placements.notes: 2–2 tie → 2–2 revote • Found idol Ep4; wasted on Emma • 11 votes against

winner.name: Emma
winner.description: Zero votes until Final 4, core alliance member, loyal player who impressed others, Iron Person - attended all 13 tribals

fanFavorite.name: Dakota
fanFavorite.description: Pre-merge exit (Episode 5), won hearts despite early elimination, early alliance leader

bestStrategic.name: Scott
bestStrategic.description: 6 challenge wins (most in season), controlled Campers Alliance, built bonds with everyone, lost to Emma's cleaner hands

bestSocial.name: Scott
bestSocial.description: Unbreakable/strong bonds with all finalists, most connected player, social dominance from merge to end

bestPhysical.name: Scott
bestPhysical.description: 3 immunity + 3 reward, back-to-back immunities Ep 9-10, dominated when it mattered

mostClutch.name: Cameron
mostClutch.description: Idol play Ep 12 - last round to use idol, cancelled Anne Maria's vote, voted out unbreakable partner

mostLoyal.name: Emma
mostLoyal.description: Core Campers Alliance member, strong bond with Scott, never flipped, only vote that didn't blindside ally

bestUnderdog.name: Cameron
bestUnderdog.description: Found idol despite obstacles, survived leaving alliances, made brutal strategic move, cast deciding vote despite losing

biggestVillain.name: Jo
biggestVillain.description: 4 extreme hatreds (Cameron, Zoey, Mike, Scott) - franchise record, left alliances repeatedly, multiple meltdowns, most hated player ever

mostChaotic.name: Lightning
mostChaotic.description: Found idol, wasted on Emma (who received 0 votes), tied vote twice, unpredictable

quietestThreat.name: Emma
quietestThreat.description: No votes until Final 4, always in majority, won when needed, game noticed too late

seasonMVP.name: Scott
seasonMVP.description: Social king everywhere, challenge domination, toughest decision (Zoey), the protagonist who didn't get the ending

biggestMeltdown.name: Jo
biggestMeltdown.description: Two major meltdowns Ep 6, left Mutant Maggots Alliance, 4 extreme hatreds formed

mostTragic.name: Sam
mostTragic.description: Never received a single vote, voted correctly both times, drew odd rock after deadlock Ep 4, sometimes the game chooses for you

mostUnlucky.name: Sam
mostUnlucky.description: Rock draw - zero votes against, did everything right, only way to lose without being targeted

messiestFeud.description: Escalated over episodes from mild to extreme, targeted each other constantly, defined multiple votes

biggestBetrayal.description: Unbreakable relationship, played idol on himself, voted out closest ally - strategic brilliance, emotional devastation

secondBiggestBetrayal.description: Unbreakable relationship, voted out to reach Final 3, she still voted for him at FTC

ironPerson.name: Emma
ironPerson.description: Attended all 13 tribal councils, never voted out, never safe by default, endurance is a strategy

legacy.summary: Introduced Gen 2 with 16 new players. Emma's perfect game (0 votes until F4) won in a tiebreaker. Scott's 6 challenge wins couldn't overcome Emma's loyalty strategy. The season where loyalty was tested—and broken.
memorableMoments: Final Tribal 3–3–1 tie; Cameron breaks tie for Emma
Dakota wins Fan Favorite despite 12th place
Sam eliminated by rocks after 3–3 tie
Lightning wastes an idol play early
Anne Maria absorbs 15 votes (most in season)
